name: Spencer Grammer
info:
• 简体中文名: 斯潘塞·格拉默
  • 别名: Spencer Karen Gramme
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1983-10-09
  • 身高: 170cm
  • 引用来源: Wikipedia
  • 出生地: 美国·加利佛尼亚州·洛杉矶
  • 配偶: James Hesketh
  • 亲属: Kelsey Grammer（父）
  • 亲属: Doreen Alderman（母）
  • 亲属: Emmett Emmanual Hesketh（长子）
  • Twitter: @spencergrammer
detail: Spencer Karen Grammer (born October 9, 1983) is an American actress best known for her roles as Summer Smith on the Adult Swim animated scifi series Rick and Morty and as Casey Cartwright on the ABC Family college romantic dramedy Greek.
